## Releases

### CMSSW_7_2_0_pre5 is out

### Changes since CMSSW_7_2_0_pre4:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_2_0_pre4...CMSSW_7_2_0_pre5


1. [5030](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5030)  from @avartak: Tk Validation dedx plot bugfix and adding eff/fake vs dR plots `dqm`

1. [4973](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4973)  from @quertenmont: Update RecoTracker/dEdx package `alca`  `analysis`  `dqm`  `operations`  `reconstruction`

1. [4937](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4937)  from @mtosi: tracking and PV validation@HLT `dqm`  `simulation`

1. [4872](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4872)  from @rovere: Move Vertex Validation histograms in a more appropriate folder. `dqm`

1. [4947](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4947)  from @VinInn: Tracker geom det `alca`  `fastsim`  `geometry`  `reconstruction`  `visualization`
